items.sentence: The advice that we got from Tom didn't really help us.
Tom is always one of the last people to finish eating.
Tom is very angry at Mary and refuses to speak to her.
Tom usually doesn't get home until very late at night.
The boys walked over and started talking to the girls.
Everything had to be rebuilt after the end of the war.
You don't plan to stay in Australia very long, do you?
You ought to stay in Australia for a couple of months.
I don't know what made me think I would enjoy it here.
Tom and Mary wanted to keep their relationship secret.
